Primordial Elements

The primordial elements of creation are Atman, Mana, Anicca, and Time. These are further divided into the plentiful and the scarce.

Plentiful

The plentiful primordial elements are understood to be infinite.

Anicca

Time

Scarce

The scarce elements are understood to be finite in some manner.

Atman

Atman are commonly known as souls. They are the nature of intelligent entities separated from the physical form of Anicca.

The Charon govern all Atman.

Mana
